components.name: Verify
components.description: May be impacted by SMS delivery issues

components.name: Customer Support Center
components.description: This includes services related to reaching support via phone, email, and chat.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to Africell Network in Sierra Leone

incident_updates.body: We are continuing to experience SMS Delivery Delays to Africell Network in Sierra Leone. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 24 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

incidents.name: SMS Delivery Delays to/from Multiple Network in Colombia Over a Subset of Short Code

incident_updates.body: We are experiencing SMS delivery delays when sending messages to/from multiple network in Colombia over a subset of Short Code. Our engineers are working with our carrier partner to resolve the issue. We will provide another update in 2 hours or as soon as more information becomes available.

affected_components.name: CARRIER NETWORK - SMS, Latin America

incident_updates.body: Our monitoring systems have detected a potential issue with SMS delivery delay to multiple network in Colombia over a subset of Short Code. Our engineering team has been alerted and is actively investigating. We will update as soon as we have more information.

incident_updates.body: Were conducting a planned Global maintenance between 19:00 to 19:30 Pacific Time on 08/02/2024. During the maintenance window, all Authy API requests will fail. Communicate to your customers (end users) about this planned downtime for maintenance before August 2, 2024. Due to Authy APIs deprecation (https://www.twilio.com/docs/verify/authy-vs-verify), we strongly encourage migrating to the Verify API. Verify API, specifically SMS/Voice OTP delivery, is unaffected by this maintenance downtime.

Multiple networks in Iraq is conducting a series of planned maintenances from 21 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 02 July 2024 at 22:00 PDT. During the maintenance window, there could be intermittent delays delivering SMS to Multiple Carrier Iraq handsets.

Note, the maintenance will be carried out on each of the following dates and times:

21 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 21 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
22 June 2024 at 20:00 PDT until 22 June 2024 at 22:00 PDT
